description:
Keep your feet warm on chilly days. The brushed long-pile interior provides a very soft feel while trapping your body heat and the lighter thermal yarns slide perfectly into tighter fitting footwear.

  • Ultralight thermal yarn for warmth without bulk
  • Moisture wicking to keep you dry all day
  • Soft brushed inside pile provides comfort and extra warmth
  • Non-binding, diabetic-friendly design provides relief for cold feet due to circulation problems
name: Heat Holders Holly Solid Ultra Lite Socks - Women's
